snippet: A former Afghan Taliban minister who was among a powerful faction of the Taliban calling for direct talks with President Hamid Karzai's government was shot and killed Monday in Pakistan's northwest city of Peshawar, on the border with Afghanistan....

headline.print_headline: Afghan Taliban Shot Dead in Pakistan's Northwest
headline.main: Afghan Taliban Shot Dead in Pakistan's Northwest

lead_paragraph: A former Afghan Taliban minister who was among a powerful faction of the Taliban calling for direct talks with President Hamid Karzai's government was shot and killed Monday in Pakistan's northwest city of Peshawar, on the border with Afghanistan.
